description.default: The air of the Golden Market is thick with the competing smells of sea salt, exotic spices, and the nearby sewage channels of the delta. Merchants of every race shout their wares, their stalls crammed together under faded, salt-stained awnings. The murmur of a hundred conversations, haggling, and hushed, dangerous-sounding deals, is constant. In the center, a verdigris-stained bronze statue of a forgotten merchant-prince serves as a perch for gulls and a common meeting spot. Paths, slick with grime and commerce, branch out in all directions.

objects.description: A verdigris-stained bronze statue of a forgotten merchant-prince, now serving mostly as a perch for gulls. Its base is a common meeting spot for deals both public and private.
objects.name: statue of a merchant-prince

objects.all_quests_done_message: The warrior nods at you. 'You've got the hang of it. Now go practice on something... uglier.'
objects.description: A grizzled old warrior paces the square, his eyes scanning for... something. He carries a long spear and looks like he's seen a hundred battles.
objects.name: a grizzled warrior

description.default: You are in the southern part of the Golden Market. The main market is to the north. To the west stands The Broken Sextant inn. To the east, a large, gaudy building with a gavel sign hangs over the door: The Auction House.

objects.description: The sturdy wooden door to The Broken Sextant, a notorious inn and mercenary guild. You could probably **ENTER** it.
objects.name: door

objects.description: A wide set of double doors leading into the Auction House. You can hear the auctioneer shouting from inside.
objects.name: auction house entrance

description.default: You are at the northern edge of the market. The main market is to the south. A wide, unguarded archway leads north toward the sprawling city docks. A stately building with tall, narrow windows stands to the east, its entrance marked 'Library & Archives'.

objects.description: The entrance to the Library & Archives. You could probably **ENTER** it.
objects.name: library entrance

description.default: You are on the western end of Ambassador's Row. The Golden Market is to the west. A set of tall, oaken doors stand here, open to the public. To the north, a grand archway leads into the Syndicate Hall.

objects.description: Tall, oaken doors carved with symbols of light and healing. This is the entrance to the Temple embassy.
objects.name: oaken doors

objects.description: A grand archway leading into the Syndicate Hall. You can **ENTER** it.
objects.name: grand archway

description.default: You are on the eastern end of Guildsman's Walk. The Golden Market is to the east. A wide marble arch leads into the bank here. To the south, you can hear the sounds of a crowd from the open-air theatre.

objects.description: A grand marble arch, polished and imposing, serving as the entrance to the bank.
objects.name: arch

objects.description: An open archway leading to the theatre.
objects.name: theatre arch

description.default: You are on Ambassador's Row, near the Docks Gate. A small, rune-etched door is set into an alley here. You also see the heavy, reinforced door of the City Barracks.

objects.description: This door is barred by a faint, shimmering field of energy. A small plaque reads: 'Elementalist's Study. Apprentices only.'
objects.name: rune-etched door

objects.description: A heavy, reinforced door. You can **ENTER** the barracks.
objects.name: barracks door

description.default: You are on Guildsman's Walk, near the Docks Gate. A solid oak door with an iron anvil sigil marks the armory. To the west, a modest building with the sign of a Winged Letter marks the Post Office.

objects.description: A heavy oak door with a sigil of an anvil and hammer. This is the town armory.
objects.name: door

objects.description: A door painted with a blue winged envelope. The entrance to the Post Office.
objects.name: post office door

description.default: You are on the southern end of Ambassador's Row. A small shop with a sign of a mortar and pestle is tucked away here, emanating strange, herbal scents. A dark alley to the east smells strongly of sewage.

objects.description: A small shop door with a sign of a mortar and pestle. This is the Apothecary. You can **ENTER**.
objects.name: shop door

objects.description: A dark, narrow alley. A rusted iron ladder descends into a sewage cistern below. You could **CLIMB** the ladder.
objects.name: dark alley

description.default: You are on the southern end of Guildsman's Walk. The door to a small furrier's shop is here, a crude sign of a stretched pelt hanging above it.

objects.description: A simple wooden door under a sign of a stretched pelt. This appears to be the furrier.
objects.name: door

description.default: You are in a simple, spartan room at The Broken Sextant. A plain bed, a small table, and a wooden chair are the only furnishings. A single door leads OUT.

hidden_objects.description: A folded piece of parchment rests on the table.
hidden_objects.name: a note

objects.description: A simple straw mattress...
objects.name: bed

objects.description: Looking out the window, you can see the bustling, grimy south market.
objects.name: window

objects.description: A small, plain wooden table.
objects.name: table

description.default: The small shop smells strongly of curing chemicals and animal musk. Pelts and claws of dubious origin are piled on a workbench. A grizzled furrier looks up as you enter.

objects.all_quests_done_message: The Furrier is busy skinning a pelt.
objects.description: A grizzled man skinning a small animal. He looks like he's seen better days.
objects.name: a grizzled furrier

description.default: You are in a grand lobby with a high, vaulted ceiling and a polished marble floor. A long counter of dark, polished wood dominates one wall, protected by armed guards. A banker waits patiently.

objects.all_quests_done_message: The banker gives you a crisp, professional nod.
objects.description: A sharply-dressed banker stands behind the counter, ready to assist you.
objects.name: a banker

objects.description: A long, polished counter of dark wood.
objects.name: counter

description.default: This small study is filled with crackling energy. Books line the walls and strange contraptions hiss and spark on a workbench. A stern-looking elementalist watches you enter.

objects.all_quests_done_message: The elementalist scoffs. 'I have no more time for apprentices. Be gone.'
objects.description: A stern-looking elementalist with crackling energy around their fingertips. They seem focused on their research.
objects.name: an elementalist

description.default: The smell of salt and fish is strong here. A sturdy stone gatehouse marks the southern exit back to the market. The docks spread out to the north, bustling with sailors and dockhands. A town guardsman stands watch here. A path leads east into a quiet clearing.

This is the central hub of the Syndicate of Coin. Desks are piled high with ledgers, and guild agents bustle about. A man at the central desk, the Syndicate Clerk, looks up as you enter. To the east is the door to the secure vaults.

objects.all_quests_done_message: The Town Clerk nods. 'Thank you again for your help.'
objects.description: A man buried in a mountain of paperwork. He looks stressed but efficient.
objects.name: a town clerk

objects.description: A reinforced iron door leading to the town's secure lockers.
objects.name: vault door

description.default: The air is thick with the smell of drying herbs, chemicals, and incense. Vials of brightly colored liquids line the shelves. A woman with stained fingers, the Apothecary, is grinding something with a mortar and pestle.

objects.all_quests_done_message: The Apothecary is busy at her workbench.
objects.description: A woman with intelligent eyes and hands stained with various herbs. She offers you a brief smile.
objects.name: an apothecary

description.default: The barracks is a functional, spartan room filled with weapon racks and training dummies. Recruits are being shouted at in a yard visible through a western window. The Guard Captain stands at a table, reviewing a map.

objects.all_quests_done_message: The Guard Captain is busy shouting at recruits.
objects.description: A tall, no-nonsense woman in polished chainmail. She looks up from her map with a stern expression.
objects.name: a guard captain

description.default: The smell of old paper and leather fills this quiet, dusty room. Tall shelves stretch up into the shadows, filled with countless books and scrolls. A Librarian sits at a desk, meticulously cataloging new arrivals.

objects.all_quests_done_message: The Librarian is busy cataloging scrolls.
objects.description: A person of indeterminate age, peering at you over a pair of spectacles. They seem to value silence.
objects.name: a librarian

description.default: You are in a small, open-air theatre. A raised wooden stage stands at one end, surrounded by simple wooden benches. A flamboyantly dressed man, the Theatre Master, is directing a pair of unenthusiastic actors.

objects.all_quests_done_message: The Theatre Master is busy rehearsing.
objects.description: A man in a velvet coat and a feathered cap, waving his arms about dramatically.
objects.name: a theatre master

description.default: A cool, secure room lined with heavy iron lockers. The air smells of stone and cold iron. A Vault Clerk sits behind a caged desk, ready to retrieve your items.

objects.description: Rows of secure storage lockers.
objects.name: iron lockers

description.default: You are in a cluttered pawnshop. The air smells of dust and old metal. Display tables are arranged around the room, laden with goods. To the south is the exit back to the street. A trash bin sits in the corner for unwanted items.

objects.description: A shrewd-looking merchant evaluating items with a critical eye.
objects.name: a pawnbroker

objects.description: A sturdy table covered in various weapons.
objects.name: Weapon Table

objects.description: A reinforced table displaying suits of armor and shields.
objects.name: Armor Table

objects.description: A table glowing with faint magical aura, holding scrolls and strange artifacts.
objects.name: Arcane Table

objects.description: A cluttered table filled with miscellaneous goods.
objects.name: Goods Table

objects.description: A large bin for disposing of worthless items.
objects.name: trash bin
